record.title: DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY, APRIL 18, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the business in order under the Calendar Wednesday rule be dispensed with on Wednesday, April 18, 2007.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Oregon?

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, reserving the right to object, would the gentlelady further clarify the unanimous consent request?
Calendar Wednesday. Unanimous consent that the business in order under the Calendar Wednesday rule be dispensed with on Wednesday, April 18.
